INSTRUCTIONS: In this task you will need to decide whether or not the two objects you see are identical.  They will be rotated with respect to one another, but some will be the same, and others will be mirror images. Press any key to begin. Press <SAMEKEY> when the two shapes are the same, and <DIFFKEY> when they differ, regardless of the angle they are shown in.
HEADER: Press '<SAMEKEY>' for same and '<DIFFKEY>' for different
AUTHOR: Shane T. Mueller
